quotes.quote: Love is unselfishly choosing for another's highest good.
Love is a lot like a backache, it doesn't show up on X-rays, but you know it's there.
Love is a mutual self-giving which ends in self-recovery.
Love is a state of mind which has nothing to do with the mind.
The most effective way to remember your wife's birthday is to forget it once.
Love can change a person the way a parent can change a baby- awkwardly, and often with a great deal of mess.
First love is a kind of vaccination which saves man from catching the complaint the second time.
Love is like the measles; we all have to go through it.
Love is a game that two can play and both win.
I thought I was promiscuous, but it turns out I was just thorough.

Love is like jumping out of an airplane knowing that someone else has packed your chute. You pull the cord hoping that a canopy opens up, but it could very well be packed full of dirty laundry and a half eaten cheese sandwich.
Women marry men hoping they will change. Men marry women hoping they will not. So each is inevitably disappointed.
The only true love is love at first sight; second sight dispels it.
To love someone as much as you love yourself, that is the ideal. Especially if that someone is your clone.
You can't make someone love you, all you can do is stalk them and hope they panic and give in.
Love is like any other luxury. You have no right to it unless you can afford it.
I love being married. It's so great to find one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
I think men who have a pierced ear are better prepared for marriage. They've experienced pain and bought jewelry.
There is a place you can touch a woman that will drive her crazy. Her heart.
People who throw kisses are hopelessly lazy.
How sweet it is to love, and to be dissolved, and as it were to bathe myself in thy love.
A woman has got to love a bad man once or twice in her life, to be thankful for a good one.

What a silly thing love is! It is not half as useful as logic, for it does not prove anything and it is always telling one things that are not going to happen, and making one believe things that are not true.
If loving someone is putting them in a straitjacket and kicking them down a flight of stairs, then yes, I have loved a few people.
The activity of love and faith is what makes heaven.
In love, somehow, a man's heart is always either exceeding the speed limit, or getting parked in the wrong place.
A good wife always forgives her husband when she's wrong.
Romantic love is mental illness. But it's a pleasurable one.
In love, you have loosened yourself like seawater.
Love is telling someone their hair extensions are showing.
